story.title: AITA for Bringing My Pet Goldfish to a Wedding?
story.description: Join the chaos as User1 reveals how they brought their pet goldfish to a wedding, and everyone has something to say about it! Spoiler: it gets wild.

messages.content: So, I brought my goldfish, Bubbles, to my friend's wedding. AITA for thinking she needed a date? 🐠
Wait, you brought a fish to a wedding?! What did you expect? A fishy dance-off? 🕺🐟
Honestly, Bubbles was the best-dressed guest. Those sequins were on point! ✨
I thought Bubbles would be a good icebreaker. Turns out she just freaked out during the vows! 😂
Did Bubbles flop around during the 'I do's'? Because that’s a strong statement! 😂
She did! The priest had to dodge her cannonball splash! 💦
Honestly, I’d hire you as a wedding entertainer. Bubbles the cannonball fish: a new trend! 🐟🎉
AITA for literally making a splash at the wedding? Because I think I might be the hero here. 😂
